text: Akhilesh Chaturvedi is an Indian Kathak performer, teacher and a choreographer. He learned Kathak dance from guru Rajendra Chaturvedi. ==Performing career== * Akhilesh Chaturvedi performed in 44th Edition of Khajuraho Dance Festival. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Indian male dancers Category:Teachers of Indian classical dance Category:Kathak exponents Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Akhilesh Chaturvedi
